001/**
002 * Classe Command - une commande du jeu d'aventure Zuul.
003 *
004 * @author HOUEE Adrien
005 */
006public class Command
007{
008    /**
009     * Un String à portée privée
010     */
011    private String aCommandWord;
012    
013    /**
014     * Un String à portée privée
015     */
016    private String aSecondWord;
017    
018    /**
019     * Create new Command instance
020     * 
021     * @param pCommandWord Principal word
022     * @param pSecondWord Second word
023     */
024    public Command(final String pCommandWord, final String pSecondWord)
025    {
026        this.aCommandWord = pCommandWord;
027        this.aSecondWord = pSecondWord;
028    } // Command
029    
030    /**
031     * Return aCommandWord
032     * 
033     * @return Command word
034     */
035    public String getCommandWord()
036    {
037        return this.aCommandWord;
038    } // getCommandWord
039    
040    /**
041     * Return aSecondWord
042     * 
043     * @return Second word
044     */
045    public String getSecondWord()
046    {
047        return this.aSecondWord;
048    } // getSecondWord
049    
050    /**
051     * Check if command has second word
052     * 
053     * @return true if there is a second word, else false
054     */
055    public boolean hasSecondWord()
056    {
057        return this.aSecondWord != null;
058    } // hasSecondWord
059    
060    /**
061     * Check if command word is known
062     * 
063     * @return true if the command is unkown, else false
064     */
065    public boolean isUnknown()
066    {
067        return this.aCommandWord == null;
068    } // isUnknown
069} // Command
